shortdesc.ph: Occurs each time the SDK receives a video frame and prompts you whether or not to rotate the captured video.

section.p: If you want to rotate the captured video according to the rotation member in the class, register this callback by calling . After you successfully register the video frame observer, the SDK triggers this callback each time it receives a video frame. You need to set whether or not to rotate the video frame in the return value of this callback.
section.note: This callback applies to RGBA video data only.

section.title: Returns
section.p:
Sets whether or not to rotate the captured video:
: Rotate.
: (Default) Do not rotate.
